analyzed: lag ba mchod ba

original: # // rnal 'byor ma 'khor gtsor gyur pa //
analyzed: rnal byor ma khor gtsor gyur ba

original: rdo rje phag mo phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo phyag tshal te

original: lag pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
analyzed: lag ba mchod ba cho ga ni

original: lugs ni ji ltar yang dag bsdu //
analyzed: lugs ni ji ltar yang dag sdud

original: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dus su dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas /
analyzed: tshogs kyi dkyil khor la sogs ba dus su dpal khor lo sdom ba rnal byor dang ldan ba sngags ba

original: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang / mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang ; srin lag dang / mthe'u chung dang / de rnams kyi sen mo rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'od dpag med dang / mi bskyod pa dang /
analyzed: lag ba g-yon ba mthe bo dang mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag dang mtheu chung dang de rnams kyi sen mo rnams la rdo rje sems dpa dang rnam ba snang mdzad dang d dpog med dang mi skyod ba dang

original: rin chen 'byung ldan dang / don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: rin chen byung ldan dang don yod grub ba rang bzhin rnams so

original: go rims ji lta bar dkar po dang / @118b ser po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang dmar ser dang / ljang gu'i kha dog rnams te /
analyzed: go rims ji lta ba dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang nag po dang dmar ser dang ljang gu kha dog rnams te

original: aom ha / na ma:hi /
analyzed: aom ha na ma:hi

original: sv'a h'a hu /
analyzed: sva ha hu

original: boo sha ta he /
analyzed: boo sha ta he

original: h'um h'um ho /
analyzed: hum hum ho

original: phat ham gi yi ge rnams bkod de /
analyzed: phat ham gi yi ge rnams bkod de

original: lag tu yang glo bur du grub pa'i padma dmar po 'dab ma lnga pa bsams te /
analyzed: lag tu yang glo bur du grub ba padma dmar po dab ma lnga ba bsams te

original: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la g-yon skor gyis rim pa ji lta bar /
analyzed: char la sogs ba dab ma rnams la g-yon skor gyis rim ba ji lta ba

original: ya mi n'i dang / rmongs byed ma dang / skul byed ma dang / skrag byed ma dang / tsanda l'i'i rang bzhin rnams /
analyzed: ya mi n dang rmongs byed ma dang skul byed ma dang skrag byed ma dang tsanda l rang bzhin rnams

original: sngon mo dang / dkar mo dang / ser mo dang / ljang gu dang / du ba'i mdog can rnams /
analyzed: sngon mo dang dkar mo dang ser mo dang ljang gu dang du ba mdog can rnams

original: hom yom // hrim mom //
analyzed: hom yom hrim mom

original: hrem hrim / h'um h'um /
analyzed: hrem hrim hum hum

original: phat phat / ces bya ba'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams blta'o //
analyzed: phat phat ces byed ba sa bon gyi yi ge rnams lta

original: padma'i lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'i rang bzhin kha dog dmar po aom bam zhes bya ba'i sa bon te /
analyzed: padma lte ba la rdo rje phag mo rang bzhin kha dog dmar po aom bam zhes byed ba sa bon te

original: 'di rnams kyi gzugs brnyan nam 'khor lo gsum gyi rgyab la yang yongs su gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: di rnams kyi gzugs rnyan nam khor lo gsum gyi rgyab la yang yongs su gsal ba byed

original: de nas lag pa la gnas pas dang / chu dang / me dang ; rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams rnams /
analyzed: de nas lag ba la gnas ba dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha khams rnams

original: ltung byed ma dang / gsod byed ma dang / 'gugs byed ma dang / gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang / padma 'bar ba rnams kyi rang bzhin du mos par bya'o //
analyzed: ltung byed ma dang gsod byed ma dang gugs byed ma dang gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang padma bar ba rnams kyi rang bzhin du mos ba byed

original: de nas lag pa la gnas pa'i sa bon de rnams la zhu ba'i rdzas kyis bsku ba byas la /
analyzed: de nas lag ba la gnas ba sa bon de rnams la ju ba rdzas kyis skud ba byed la

original: lag pa'i mthil der dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor mar byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'khor lo gsum gyi rang bzhin du mos pa byas la de zhu ba la sogs pa'i rdzas yi ge gsum gyis sam rkang ba brgyad pa'i dngags kyis dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: lag ba mthil der dpa bo dang rnal byor mar byin gyis brlabs ba khor lo gsum gyi rang bzhin du mos ba byed la de ju ba la sogs ba rdzas yi ge gsum gyis sam rkang ba brgyad ba dngags kyis bul ba byed

original: de nas yang dag par mchod la lhag pa dang chad pa bskang pa'i phyir yi ge brgya pa bzlas par byas la 'khor lo byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i don du gsol ba btab la /
analyzed: de nas yang dag ba mchod la lhag ba dang chad ba skong ba phyir yi ge brgya ba bzlas ba byed la khor lo byin gyis brlab ba la sogs ba don du gsol ba debs la

original: rdzas de gzhan nam gzhan du bzhag la /
analyzed: rdzas de gzhan nam gzhan du jog la

original: lag pa g-yon pa'i rdzas rnams kyis g-yon pa'i srin lag gis blangs pas snying ga dang / lce dang spyi bo la h'um a'a:aom zhes brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas bsku bar bya'o //
analyzed: lag ba g-yon ba rdzas rnams kyis g-yon ba srin lag gis blangs ba snying ga dang lce dang spyi bo la hum aa:aom zhes rjod ba sngon du gro ba skud ba byed

original: de lha'i tshogs rnams bdag nyid la gzhug par mos par bya'o //
analyzed: de lha tshogs rnams bdag nyid la jug ba mos ba byed

original: cho ga 'di rnams rnal 'byor ma /
analyzed: cho ga di rnams rnal byor ma

original: kun du spyod pa dang 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: kun du spyod ba dang brel ba ste

original: lag pa'i mchod pa aa bhi yu ka tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lag ba mchod ba aa bhi yu ka tas mdzad ba rdzogs so
